PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-17871997-12-020,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of JACQUES LAPOMMERAY, of Candiac, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of three years, effective January 19, 1998.
